resources.string: Cellulite Gone Away app is designed to make your life healthier. You can burn your calories with the help of Cellulite Gone Away. Just start your seanse by clicking on Start Seanse. Each 5 minutes your phone will vibrate and burn your calories. The full course duration is 2 months. With the help of charts you can see your monthly activities. You will receive notifcations to run your course. Everytime you can switch on/off notification.
The "Cellulite Gone Away" is inactive now. It will activate again after execution time because app should burn your calories in appropriate time. Thanks for being with us!
